entries.s_f9a16624: I get the picture. What can I do to help?
entries.s_ec321028: Oh. Maybe I spoke hastily. But how did you know what to get? [check the supplies] Yes, these all look correct. I'm impressed. Ever think about becoming an artist's assistant?
entries.s_d21432e3: I did get your supplies though.
entries.s_cc45360d: Did you even try? I'm not sure why I bothered to ask for your help.
entries.s_c4960c85: Who are you?  Never mind, I think we both know that doesn't matter.
entries.s_a95dd416: What? But... you... I see. Very well. I see how your true colors now.
entries.s_a8a01106: Your excuses are as transparent as a Twi'lek entertainers clothing.  Lets both just forget I asked.
entries.s_a2c41722: I'm afraid your assistant will not be coming back... but I have your supplies.
entries.s_a1ae198d: Have you found my assistant yet?
entries.s_a0e28661: No and I'm not going to. Find him yourself.
entries.s_8bed149:
My assistant is out collecting a mixture of mud and refuse that is just right for the colors I need.  If you could please meet him there and assist him in returning safely I would be ever appreciative.

I have given you a waypoint to his location.  Please hurry.
entries.s_81192d80: Lady, you're a freak. Get a real job and leave the rest of us alone.
entries.s_78bd6c2: Thank you. Let me know when you find him.
entries.s_76f9d659:
I'm an aspiring artist working on some paintings using natural materials as the base for my paints.  The texture and brilliance of the colors I get using them echoes the emotions I try to express in my work. 

I sent my assistant out to retrieve some more supplies but he has yet to return.
entries.s_705f9dd1: I haven't been able to find your assistant.
entries.s_5e1dfbcd: Yes... you see if I don't get the supplies I need to make the paints I'm afraid I will not be able to finish my paintings.  Which means my patrons will not receive those paintings and will therefore not pay me. This in turn means I won't be able to pay my bills.
entries.s_593d8ed6: Not yet. I'm still working on it.
entries.s_4f3396fb:
Oh no, he will.  Sorry for not bringing this up before, but it is not the first time he has done this.  I know it's not the most glamorous job in the world, but I think a part of him sort of enjoys it.

Anyway, thank you for your help and for bringing my supplies.
entries.s_35c6bce6: Thank you so much for retrieving my supplies. I'm not sure what I'll do about getting another assistant, but that's something I can worry about later.
entries.s_28225432: Where is my assistant with those supplies. Arrgh, this is becoming annoying.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (padawan_artist_01.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
